description:
Tokine`s father. He was not blessed with the sign of the legitimate successor, so his power was limited, but he kept a positive attitude nevertheless. Tokio died a couple years ago when he let his guard down whilst patrolling the Karasumori site; it is left ambiguous whether his final warning to Tokine not to let her guard down around `them` referred to Ayakashi or to Urukai.
(Wikipedia)
name: Yukimura Tokio
